purpose: Facilitates the rapid development and coordination of chatbots and multi-agent systems.
principle: Utilizes LangGraph and Langchain for agent orchestration, combined with FastAPI and NextJS for building web interfaces.
reusability: Offers a modular architecture with APIs for easy integration and extension, and supports multiple agent frameworks.
limitations: Being in alpha, it may have stability issues and limited documentation; primarily designed for specific frameworks.
name: flock
description: Flock is a workflow-based low-code platform for rapidly building chatbots, RAG, and coordinating multi-agent teams, powered by LangGraph, Langchain, FastAPI, and NextJS.（Flock 是一个基于workflow工作流的低代码平台，用于快速构建聊天机器人、RAG、Agent和Muti-Agent应用，采用 LangGraph、Langchain、FastAPI 和 NextJS 构建。）
highlight: Low-code platform for building and orchestrating multi-agent systems using workflows.
